explains: v. 翻找，乱翻；（海关人员）彻底检查（船只）
n. 翻寻；捐赠品，旧杂货；（海关人员对船只的）彻底检查

sentences.en: They rummage through piles of secondhand clothes for something that fits.
sentences.cn: 他们在成堆的二手衣服中翻找合身的衣服。

sentences.en: A brief rummage will provide several pairs of gloves.
sentences.cn: 稍许翻一下就会找到几副手套。

sentences.en: Have a rummage around in the drawer and see if you can find a pen.
sentences.cn: 翻翻抽屉，看能不能找到一支钢笔。
